DOC.brief_title: Normal and Abnormal ERP During ToM and Emotional Conflicts in Schizophrenia
DOC.detailed_description: The main objective of this study is to define and characterize electrophysiological markers of the existing social cognition disorders in schizophrenia. Two groups of subjects are recorded : schizophrenic patients and healthy controls. Visual reinforcement effect during theory of mind judgment is tested.
DOC.criteria: Written informed consent French mother tongue Schizophrenia diagnosis according to DSMIVR for the patient group Coma history, epilepsy, head trauma with loss knowledge greater 10 min ECT older than 1 month DSM4 R criteria of toxic addiction in the last 6 months Deafness or blindness Scalp pathology Intracranial implanted device
